title: WCAS PHYSICS 337-0-1 Introduction to Solid State Physics

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute (2145 Sheridan Road), Room F-114, Evanston

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class discusses some basic physical properties of solids, including: crystal structure and how to determine it; solutions of the Schroedinger equation in periodic potentials; insulators, conductors and semiconductors; magnetic properties.
